title: AI Won’t Kill Indian IT Industry, Will Create More Work: JP Morgan
description: JPMorgan Chase said artificial intelligence is unlikely to replace Indian IT services companies, arguing fears of extinction are exaggerated. Instead, AI will act as a productivity tool, creating new work in legacy modernisation, SaaS rewrites and AI integration, while helping firms deliver more within existing budgets.
content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) is unlikely to replace IT services companies anytime soon, according to a new report by JP Morgan’s Asia Pacific Equity Research team.
Instead of shrinking the industry, AI is expected to become another tool that helps co... [1845 chars]

title: Top Putin aide to lead Russian delegation for AI Impact Summit in New Delhi
description: India is set to host the AI Impact Summit 2026, a high-profile gathering of global leaders and industry heavyweights in Artificial Intelligence from February 16-20 at New Delhi's 'Bharat Mandapam,' bringing together policymakers, industry leaders and technology innovators.
content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin’s senior aide Maxim Oreshkin will lead a large delegation for the AI Impact Summit being held in New Delhi from Monday.
